snippet: A letter sent by the biologist Francis Crick to his 12-year-old son in 1953 about his discovery of the structure of DNA was sold at auction for $5.3 million, according to Christie’s.
abstract: Christie's says letter sent by the biologist Francis Crick to his 12-year-old son in 1953 about his discovery of the structure of DNA has been sold at auction for $5.3 million.
lead_paragraph: A letter sent by the biologist Francis Crick to his 12-year-old son in 1953 about his discovery of the structure of DNA was sold at auction for $5.3 million, according to Christie’s.

headline.main: Family Letter About DNA Is Sold at Auction
headline.print_headline: Family Letter About DNA Is Sold at Auction
